title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
text: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is the second volume in the epic fantasy epic The Lord of the Rings. It begins with the events of the first volume, The Fellowship of the Ring, and follows the events of The Return of the King. The story of the Lord of the Rings is told by the main character, Frodo Baggins, who is accompanied by his loyal companion, Samwise Gamgee, and his three Hobbit friends, Pippin, Merry, and Sam. The story follows the hobbit Frodo and his companions as they set out to destroy the One Ring, the only Ring that can destroy the Dark Lord Sauron, from the clutches of the Nine Hells, by means of the One Ring.
